useCase.name: View Ordered Candidates List
useCase.description: The Customer Manager requests to see an ordered list of candidates for a job opening based on the job interview grades.

preconditions.precondition: The Customer Manager is logged in to the system.

successEndConditions.condition: The Customer Manager is able to view the ordered candidates list.

useCase.trigger: Customer Manager requests to view ordered candidates list.

mainSequence.step: Customer Manager requests to view ordered candidates list.
UI presents a list of job openings to the Customer Manager.
Customer Manager selects a job opening.
Controller lists candidates for the selected job opening.
Application Service retrieves candidates related to the job opening.
Controller retrieves related job interviews of the candidates.
Controller sorts the interviews based on job interview grades.
UI displays the ordered list of candidates with their grades to the Customer Manager.
